author: rwhitcomb
msg: This change delays the closing transition of a Sheet until all the
listeners have weighed in on the closing vote.  That way, if the
first listener (the skin) is okay with closing, but a later listener
is not, the transition will not start and have to be reversed
This is a merge of revision 1409081 from trunk to branches/2.0.x.

author: rwhitcomb
msg: This change delays the closing transition of a Sheet until all the
listeners have weighed in on the closing vote.  That way, if the
first listener (the skin) is okay with closing, but a later listener
is not, the transition will not start and have to be reversed

msg: Trim trailing spaces - No functional change
